chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Choice of an Ajah
chapters.info: Lord Perival Mantear, p. 108—High Seat of House Mantear. He is a pretty, golden-haired boy. He pledged the support of House Mantear to Elayne on his first trip to Caemlyn. His House controlled the Lion Throne until the death of Queen Mordrellen, both because the Daughter-Heir disappeared and because the family had become heavy with male children. He and his House are among Elayne's most adamant supporters.
